```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(rnaturalearth)
library(mosaic)
```

```{r}
thailand <- read.csv('Thailand_Rainfall_Data.csv')
```

```{r}
thailand_shape <- ne_states(country = "thailand") |> 
  select(name, geometry)

```


```{r}
final_thailand <- thailand |> 
  left_join(thailand_shape, join_by(name == name))
```


```{r}
ggplot(thailand_shape) + 
  geom_sf(aes(fill = final_thailand$X1991.07)) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c("Average Annual Percipitation (mm)", direction = -1) + 
  labs(x = "Latitude", y = "Longitude", title = "Precipitation Thailand 1901-2007", caption = "Data from the World Bank Group", alt = "Thailand has a large amount of precipitation especially in the center of the country") +
  theme_bw()
  
```
